message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. We believe its value far surpasses $12000, reflecting its exceptional quality and unique features. Considering the exclusivity and the benefits it offers, we kindly propose an offer of $15000 for this product. We look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product, but I am looking for a more reasonable price. Could you consider offering the product at $12000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.
